name: ABS Partners
overview:
ABS Partners is one of the largest owners of office space/real estate in New York. Headquartered 200 Park Avenue South, in Union Square/Flatiron, ABS owns and manages over 11 million square feet of real estate. ABS is the owner of 915 Broadway, the only building dedicated tech hub in New York and home to General Assembly & Union Square Ventures.

TechStarter is the creative arm of ABS Partners. It is the marketing, leasing, and management team that handles all start-up/tech requirements. TechStater places importance on the micro and macro segments of the start-up/ tech scene, focusing on sustainability, growth, and synergy.

TechStater helps start-ups better understand the real estate industry and their real estate footprint.

ABS Buildings:

Downtown: Union Square/Flatiron, Chelsea, TriBeCa, SoHo, FiDi 200 Park Avenue South, 915 Broadway, 401 Broadway, 19 Union Square West, 133 W 21st Street, 20 W 22nd Street, 210 Eleventh Avenue, 162 Fifth Avenue, 148 Ninth Avenue, 44 Wall Street, 220 E 23rd Street, 137 Fifth Avenue, 380 Second Avenue, and more…

Midtown: Gramercy, Bryant Park, Plaza, Murray Hill 1001 Avenue of the Americas, 145 E 32nd Street, 33 E 33rd Street, 10 E 34th Street, 9 E 37th Street, 254 W 31st Street, 225 W 37th Street, 8 W 38th Street, 21 W 38th Street, 29 W 38th Street, 49 W 38th Street, 60-64 W 38th Street, 24 W 40th Street, and more…
